mode.name: Mode
mode.value2: 1. Drop - Allows to remove rows/column with null values.
mode.value3: 2. Fill - Allows to replace null values.

dropType.name: Drop Type
dropType.value2: "Column" option allows to remove all or specific columns where all the rows have null values.
dropType.value3: "Row" option allows to remove all rows, where all the values are null.

dropChoice.name: Drop Choice
dropChoice.value2: 1."Names"- remove all rows, where all the values are null in some column (works as a filter).

dropColumns.name: Drop Columns
dropColumns.value: Which columns to delete if Drop Choice = "Names" .

fillValueType.name: Fill Value Type
fillValueType.value3: Set aggregation function in "Fill Strategy" field.

fillChoice.name: Fill Choice
fillChoice.value2: 1."Names"- provide specific column(s) and value for it in "Fill nulls" section.
fillChoice.value5: Use the Plus button to add Column/Value pairs.

fillValues.name: Fill Values
fillValues.value: Value(s) for columns to replace nulls.

fillColumns.name: Fill Columns
fillColumns.value: Column(s) to be replaced by using aggregate function
